item.title: Netcat Bandwidth Test
item.description: Netcat Bandwidth Test netcat-server nc -l -p 12345 | wc -c netcat-client dd if=/dev/zero bs=$((2**20)) count=$((2**10)) | nc -q 0 netcat-server 12345 #or dd if=/dev/zero bs=1024k count=300 | nc netcat-server 12345 on the server run nload to see the bandwidth used at eth0 for incoming and outgoing Referensi: https://blog.bjdean.id.au/2017/03/bandwidth-measurement-using-netcat/ https://www.thegeekstuff.com/2012/04/nc-command-examples/
